summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1842, for the improvement of Sixteenth Avenue Northeast, University Boulevard, Eighteenth Avenue Northeast and Nineteenth Avenue Northeast, each from East Forty-fifth Street to East Fifty-fifth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by attaching hydrant to the existing water mains therein, under Ordinance No. 19034, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
